resources.string: WITH RECURSIVE [categories]([id], [name], [parent_id], [is_visible]) AS ( SELECT [category].[id] AS [id], [category].[name] AS [name], [category].[parent_id] AS [parent_id], [category].[is_visible] AS [is_visible] FROM [category] UNION SELECT [categories].[id] AS [id], [category].[name] || \'>\' || [categories].[name] AS [name], [category].[parent_id] AS [parent_id], [categories].[is_visible] AS [is_visible] FROM [categories] INNER JOIN [category] ON [category].[id] = [categories].[parent_id] ) SELECT [categories].[id] AS [id], [categories].[name] AS [text], [categories].[is_visible] AS [is_visible] FROM [categories] WHERE [categories].[parent_id] IS NULL;
